title: Fattcatt
author: Fattcatt
created_time: February 03, 2023, 10:44:41 PMLast edit: March 04, 2023, 06:27:36 PM by Fattcatt
content: https://www.greatcollections.comSatori....PreforkersMoonbitsVarying end times. 2 days to 9 days...looks like some real deals

comments.author: Fattcatt
comments.body: I guess this means Cryptocurrency is getting up a head of steam and going mainstream now.

comments.author: Lesbian Cow
comments.body: Quote from: Fattcatt on February 03, 2023, 10:44:41 PMhttps://www.greatcollections.com/Sell/CurrentSatori....PreforkersMoonbitsVarying end times. 2 days to 9 days...looks like some real deals   Wouldn't it be simpler to just post "Hi everyone, I have some great coins for sale in the next great collections auction.  Check them out with this link"?

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: The link doesn't show anything, just brings me directly to a login page.Can the auction(s) be viewed without a login, too?Not familiar with this website - is it a big thing among coin collectors?

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: LOL.. A rep from this site literally  CALLED me today, and I mentioned crypto coins after he tried getting me to buy Morgans.. (lol)....He had NO fuckin clue what I was even talking about, so GL with this site, it should be more interesting if you can actually post your link.. Quote from: Kryptowerk on February 04, 2023, 12:51:56 AMNot familiar with this website - is it a big thing among coin collectors?Yes, they have a lot of cool collections but I have not seen any cryptos there yet myself.. I get the weekly spam from them, some of the toned/older USA coins are super beautiful, but way out of my price range!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I searched “crypto” and got 12 resultshttps://www.greatcollections.com/search.php?q=Crypto&mode=product&sort=01Searching “bitcoin” got me 2 resultshttps://www.greatcollections.com/search.php?q=Bitcoin&mode=product&sort=01I need to get one of those 5k bits btc coins - hate to sign up on another site though meh

comments.author: YodasRedRocket
comments.body: Great collections is good.  I bought a couple pre-33 gold coins from them about a year ago & they were easier to deal with than Stacks Bowers’s.  Great collections also doesn’t charge state sales tax!  Shipped fast… 20X better than my Stacks Bowers experience!  I believe this is their first crypto auction.

comments.author: Fattcatt
comments.created_time: March 01, 2023, 08:41:37 PMLast edit: March 04, 2023, 06:28:47 PM by Fattcatt
comments.body: Still coins and chips available.  Check it out!! https://www.greatcollections.com

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: Fattcatt on March 01, 2023, 08:41:37 PMStill coins and chips available.  Check it out!! https://www.greatcollections.com/Sell/Current Um. That must be your own personal link, it does not work for anyone else. That was pointed out to you in this very thread, but apparently you don't understand or read. Quote from: Kryptowerk on February 04, 2023, 12:51:56 AMThe link doesn't show anything, just brings me directly to a login page.

comments.author: tread93
comments.body: Quote from: Fattcatt on February 03, 2023, 10:44:41 PMhttps://www.greatcollections.com/Sell/CurrentSatori....PreforkersMoonbitsVarying end times. 2 days to 9 days...looks like some real deals   Its really nice to see some of the more numismatist oriented coin dealers offering crypto coins to the masses! This is great news for our hobby! Pair that up with Stacks bowers coming up and soon you will see more and more of these coins being offered even on APMEX one day soon maybe?! That would be pretty cool to see.

comments.author: Fattcatt
comments.body: People in here know the site. Just doing my part to widen the exposure for our hobby. Clearly, if my link doesn't work, you're welcome to research it yourself.    Great to be an American, I can come into chats and say whatever I like. And I will. Always.

comments.author: montreal1
comments.body: Don’t even see anything for sale/auction..

comments.author: Fattcatt
comments.body: Go to:  www.greatcollectables.com...  you'll find them, might take you awhile to familiarize yourself with their site.

comments.author: PreciousMetapsICT
comments.body: Quote from: Fattcatt on March 04, 2023, 06:26:27 PMGo to:  www.greatcollectables.com...  you'll find them, might take you awhile to familiarize yourself with their site.  Actually a pain in the ass to find… but I found it and even bought a 5k moonbits for what I consider cheap. Gonna buy some more if they stay cheap

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: PreciousMetapsICT on March 04, 2023, 06:39:28 PMQuote from: Fattcatt on March 04, 2023, 06:26:27 PMGo to:  www.greatcollectables.com...  you'll find them, might take you awhile to familiarize yourself with their site.  Actually a pain in the ass to find… but I found it and even bought a 5k moonbits for what I consider cheap. Gonna buy some more if they stay cheap yea they have 4 of them, watching them closely too as I want to get one for the collection.

comments.author: PreciousMetapsICT
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on March 04, 2023, 06:55:59 PMQuote from: PreciousMetapsICT on March 04, 2023, 06:39:28 PMQuote from: Fattcatt on March 04, 2023, 06:26:27 PMGo to:  www.greatcollectables.com...  you'll find them, might take you awhile to familiarize yourself with their site.  Actually a pain in the ass to find… but I found it and even bought a 5k moonbits for what I consider cheap. Gonna buy some more if they stay cheap yea they have 4 of them, watching them closely too as I want to get one for the collection.Fees and shipping aren’t that expensive- plus I don’t believe they charged me tax. Way less add on fees than stacks.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: Fattcatt on March 04, 2023, 06:26:27 PMGo to:  www.greatcollectables.com...  you'll find them, might take you awhile to familiarize yourself with their site.  Am I the only asshole here who noticed that this link goes to a dead site? Learn to spell there Fattcatt, and stop wasting our f'n time. And NO, it's not MY job to fix or figure our your broken links every other day...
